name: Custom Login And Signup Widget
author: Bitto Kazi

sections.description:
Custom Login And Signup Widget plugin gives your site the ability to put custom meta widget for login, signup and password reset with javascript effect. no jquery needed. just install the plugin and put the widget where you wish. you can also customize the signup email and password reset email sender’s email address and sender name. demo plugin developed by bitto kazi

Arbitrary section 1
sections.installation:
1. Upload ‘custom-login-signup-widget.zip’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory and extract the zip file
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
A question that someone might have

for questions please write here
